message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper describes an open source Java library for automatic text categorization and related problems, which are of special interest in opinion mining applications. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of computer science that deal with natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning applied to text data. Specifically, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category, as it deals with NLP and its applications. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also likely, as it deals with the retrieval of relevant information from large collections of text data. cs.LG (Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also possible sub-categories, as they deal with machine learning and its applications. Finally, cs.DL (Machine Learning) is a less likely sub-category, as it is more focused on deep learning methods, which are not explicitly mentioned in the abstract.
